description:
11.272 varblur
Apply variable blur filter by using 2nd video stream to set blur radius.
The 2nd stream must have the same dimensions.

This filter accepts the following options:


The varblur filter also supports the framesync options.
name: varblur

options.description: Set min allowed radius. Allowed range is from 0 to 254. Default is 0.
options.name: min_r

options.description: Set max allowed radius. Allowed range is from 1 to 255. Default is 8.
options.name: max_r

options.description: Set which planes to process. By default, all are used.
options.name: planes
